main.name: Sardar Shoaib
main.description: I have over two years of experience as a full-stack developer with a solid understanding of front-end and back-end technologies. I have strong knowledge of the MERN stack with vast experience in building web applications using React, mobile applications using React Native for the client side, Node.js/Express for the server side, and MongoDB for the database. I have expertise in Redux and React for building user interfaces and strong knowledge of state stores, middleware, action creators, reducers, and containers. deep understanding of JavaScript advanced concepts such as Closure, Scope Chain, async/await, and strong knowledge of object-oriented programming, design patterns, and agile scrum methodology
main.bio: I am a Computer Scientist who just completed BSCS degree from the Pakistan one of the best IT university Federal urdu university Islamabad in Computer Science. I am a highly skilled professional developer who loves to take on the challenges and then solve them.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.
